inn1.comm: 130 kph, starts on the pads with a length ball. Gayle looks to fend it away towards midwicket, but cannot connect. Little bit more bounce than he expected

is he gone?! Umpire Rod Tucker was not looking, even he must have thought there couldn't be action so soon, but there is! The third umpire confirms it. Gayle is also on the floor, grimacing rather badly. He had dabbed the length ball which got exaggerated seam movement away from the batsman and ran. Bhuvi rushed to the ball and broke the stumps direct and found the batsman short of his ground. Gayle's momentum forced him to take an awkward tumble, trying to get his bat out of the way. He landed badly on his knee and the stretcher is out and Gayle is being carried out of the field
length ball just outside off stump, left for the keeper
130 kph, he is tempted outside off stump and a little nibble of away movement takes the goodish length ball away from the outside edge
struck quite well as he moves forward to drive the full length ball into just wide of mid-off
move away movement, this one at 132 kph, and the batsman is squared up. He was on the back foot looking to defend, but he has underestimated Bhuvi's away swinger
angles across the right-hander on a good length who is happy to watch it to through to the keeper
full length ball on off stump is met with a sedate and straight bat as the ball finds mid-off
that one cuts inward just a bit and Charles who was looking to flay it through the covers by his backlift, curtails himself and blocks
this one is right in the slot and is smashed straight down the ground. He was on off stump, but a little too full as Charles gets forward and drills it to the right of mid-off
128 kph, and it goes to Dhoni on the second bounce! That just dribbled along the floor as he angled the full length ball across the right-hander's off stump. He wafts and misses
tightens up as he targets middle on a good length and is nudged into the leg side off the batsman's hip
goes on the bounce to Dhoni again as the full length ball, seaming away a touch is left alone

and this one rears up! The inswinger this time and Samuels is struck on the right glove. It pitched on a good length but bounced a lot higher than he expect. Samuels seems to already have that hand in heavy bandages
full length ball, but the away swinger was a little too far outside off the tempt the batsman
and Dhoni has to take this around chest-high. What is going on here? Gentle away swinger bowled on a fullish length outside off that the batsman wants nothing to do with
strays on the pads and Samuels is happy to clip it through square leg to rotate strike
134 kph, more inward movement for Bhuvi but the batsman negotiates it well, getting forward to the good length ball just outside off and blocking towards midwicket
watches it carefully through to Dhoni's gloves as this was pitched right up there and swung in after pitching
oh my God, he has absolutely flayed that! And it goes all the way! There was all the width the batsman could ever ask for and Samuels feasted on it as he stays in the crease and slams that over point
full length ball, seaming in to tuck the batsman up to follow up and keeps him quiet
steers the full length ball just to the left of point and takes the single. Soft hands there
on the pads and Charles will be disappointed not to whip that away through the leg side. Good length ball, perhaps with a shade of seam inward beating the flick shot
and its Charles' turn! Got on the front foot to meet the length ball and launched it over the long-on boundary. Sheer power and it struck quite low on the bat too
strides confidently forward and drives the full length ball just to the left of mid-off
shorter and wider, but the batsman is stuck in the crease as he cuts it straight to point, no timing there
makes room outside leg, but Bhuvi follows him. It was back of a length and moving in at the batsman's body. Charles goes through with the cut, but it bounces above his bat and goes though to Dhoni
drilled to mid-off as he makes his own room to meet the full length ball on off stump
down the leg side and called wide by the umpire. The batsman moving around in the crease must have upset Bhuvi here
flicked off the hip to deep fine leg. It was a length ball on leg stump
finishes off well though as he forces the batsman to defend the fullish ball just outside off

but it makes no use as he continues to afford room outside off. Charles who is batting outside his crease, gets on the front foot and unleashes a full swing of his bat as it whistles away to the cover boundary
speared in at middle as the batsman tucks it away toward the square leg region
back of a length and angled in at the batsman's body. He looked a little hurried as he looked to tuck the ball away square on the leg side. Can't get bat to it though
straight to Raina. Full length ball on off stump is driven on the up, but short cover is on hand to prevent any runs
slower ball, at 117 kph, and it seems to cut away as the batsman rides the movement to steer it behind square on the off side
employs a back of length ball outside off to finish the over as Charles lets his bat hang with an open face and dabs it to point
full and straight from Bhuvi as the batsman plays a checked drive to mid-off.
shortens the length just a tad, but he does not present any room. The batsman stays in his crease and chops the ball to point
picked up from the off stump and sent packing over midwicket. It was a pretty decent ball, but all credit to the batsman there as his wrists made that shot happen
width offered this time and pounced on! Short and wide, and Charles goes back and pounds it through point

this time he lets the pace of the bowler does the work for him. he had spotted deep fine leg moving to deep midwicket and with the line being too straight, all he needed to do was get a little bat on it and so he did
finishes with a length ball on middle to which the batsman has no trouble keeping out
thick outside edge as he pitches the ball right up to the batsman. The hint of away movement beats the expansive drive and makes the ball run off to deep third man
change of pace. The off cutter again as Charles tries to run this to third man but he misses completely
another slower ball and with very little pace to work with, the batsman who had opened the face of his bat, can only get it as far as point
well played. he knew there were no deep fielders on the off side and took advantage. Moves outside leg and shovels the full length ball from the stumps over the point fielder
117 kph, cutter again and this time his length and line are good as Charles bunts it to long-on
another one that bounces on its way to the keeper. It was fullish and outside off stump, causing Samuels to want to steer the ball to third man again, but comes up with a whole bunch of air
138 kph, starts off with a shortish ball just outside off stump. Charles stayed still and steers the ball behind point
that one ducks in from a length at 139 kph as Samuels gets back behind it to block
strays a little too straight that time and the batsman moves across to his off stump and works it away behind square on the leg side
takes a step outside leg, as has been his wont so far to bring up the fifty partnership. It was nowhere near the middle, but the slash had enough on it to run away to the cover boundary
139 kph, this was all timing as the length ball is driven on the up. There was a man at short point, but it went too quickly to him and the cover fielder has to mop up
wanted to flat bat it down the ground, but this one hasn't come onto the bat as easily as the others and foils his timing as the ball trickles away down the pitch

another excellent shot. It was coming into the batsman, but Bhuvi had made the mistake of starting it too wide outside off. Samuels stayed leg side of it, opened the face on impact, and just caressed the ball through the off side in field
on a length on middle stump and he stays back behind it to keep it out
oh, and it goes right through where slip would have been! It was a good length ball, nibbling away a touch. Samuels went for it, got a thick edge and is fortunate to get a four
on a length just outside off and is driven back to the bolwer
goes for it away, wildly expansive drive that would have deposited the ball over extra cover, but Samuels misses
good length ball outside off stump draws the batsman into a defensive prod, the away swing beats him and the ball dribbles to Dhoni who stops it with his pads
tossed up on leg stump and he's picked away to deep square leg for a single
ample flight again as this one is full on off stump and is pushed back to the bowler
full and on middle as he pushes it down the ground to long-on

dives full length and he's caught it! He held it back just a touch and Charles was lured into the shot. He's been driving on the up and has had great success with it, but not this time. Jadeja lures the leading edge, takes a couple of steps and dives horizontally to his left and holds on!
tossed up on off stump and he bunts it down the pitch, but Jadeja makes good ground to his left to keep it to a dot
opens the face to steer this ball past the diving slip fielder to get off the mark
full on middle stump and it is met with a simple defensive bat
uses his feet to meet this full length ball outside off, but having not reached the pitch, he only blocks
holds this one back just a tad and the batsman, wary of it, keeps bat and pad close and defends
pushed down the ground to long-on to pick up an easy single
tossed up and turns just a shade away as he covers for it and blocks
more flight from Raina as Bravo gets nicely forward and drives to long-off
good use of the crease as he goes right back to cut the ball just to the left of point
pushed through on off stump and he gets forward to push it into the covers with soft hands
tossed up and angled in to middle, Samuels keeps his legs away from the line of his bat as he drives to long-off
tossed up on off stump and Bravo pushes it to mid-off

this time he uses the flight on the ball to loft it straight over mid-off's head. Clean strike even if it was hit against the turn. The front foot stride made that shot, helping him reach the pitch of the ball
wanted to nudge it away off the pads, but there was more turn on the length ball than he expected and he cannot connect
flat, good length ball on middle and the batsman keeps it out off the back foot

that kept too low! And the batsman had no chance. It was a simple length ball and he was justified in moving back to play the cut, but the ball scuttled well beneath the bat and hits the very base of middle stump
on a length turning in, but he stays back and works it away to deep midwicket
flighted on off stump and he lets the ball come to him before opening the face and guiding the ball behind square on the off side off the frotn foot
tossed up on middle and leg and he drives down the ground to long-on
full length ball, getting a little turn away is blocked towards point
pushed through on the pads and it hits him there as Simmons was looking to play around his front pad
gets forward looking to smother the little turn on offer and defends
full and on middle stump as he comes forward to defend
a little more flight on offer and the batsman makes use of it as he drives to long-on
pushed through at 97 kph as the batsman gets his bat down just in time

loud appeal as this one kicks off the pitch from a full length. The batsman was going for a forward defensive, but the ball leaps off the top flap of his pad. Dhoni has to juggle a little, but takes it and looks quite enthusiastic, but umpire Rod Tucker is not too fussed. Replays shows there might have been a slight inside edge, but the crowd are just way too loud for the umpire to pick that up
tossed up on middle and leg as he comes forward to block
pushed through on off stump as he goes back to defend
shortish ball outside off and he punches it through to cover
not too much room to work with, but Bravo opens the face at exactly the right time to let that full, fast ball run off the face of the bat fine and to the third man boundary
goes down to sweep, but it was just a bit too quick as Raina spears it full on leg stump. They still manage a leg bye though
clipped away off the pads as Jadeja strays too straight. Good running and placement helps them get a couple there.
on the pads again, but this was on a good length allowing it to turn and the batsman can get it away only as far as midwicket
this is outside off and Bravo stays back to dab it fine of point
pushed through at 95 kph as the batsman comes forward to defend
flighted on middle and off as he goes forward and nudges it away into the off side
pushed through and Bravo was looking to use the pace and find the third man fence again, but this time he is nowhere near the ball as Dhoni stops it with his pads close together.
darts this one in on leg which is played straight to short-leg
on a similar line as Simmons is able to tuck this away square on the leg side
going round the wicket now to the left-hander as Darren tries to squirt this away
quicker one fired in on middle and off as Darren defends competently
this one bangs into the front pad, but is clearly missing leg as Raina goes up for the appeal
short of a length on and around off as Darren hits this straight to backward point
floated on middle and leg as Lendl works this away to the leg side
back of a length and get's a lot of turn off the wicket, with Dhoni able to snap it up from behind

short again from Ashwin as Darren gets on the back foot to hammer this away to extra-cover, with Yuvraj diving near the boundary to stop three runs. Don't know why the pair only ran a single, when two was on offer
drifted on and around off as Lendl gets forward in defence
on leg stump and turning away quite sharply, and with bounce, as this one goes behind the batsmen's legs for a wide
in the same channel as Lendl is able to clip this gently to the leg side
fuller length ball on middle which is cut away by Darren to the square boundary, with Yuvraj coming into play once again as he dives in front of the boundary to stop four
Raina fires in a quicker one on off which Lendl drives handsomely to extra-cover
fuller length delivery which is driven to cover for a single
back of a length and again keeping low as Lendl gets on the back foot to flick this through the leg side

full from Raina as Darren goes for the drive, but gets a thick edge which goes through the third man region for four. No slip in there so the shot was definitely on, even though it was not the intention
length ball which is punched off the back foot to extra-cover
gets this one just outside off as Lendl looks for the drive, but the ball is away from the bat as it continues through to the keeper
fuller and stays low as Bravo defends on the front foot
beautiful line and length as Bravo defends this towards mid-off, and sets off for a single
fuller length ball again as Lendl gets forward in defence
length ball again which hits Lendl's front pad, bu the ball was just outside the line, and going over, on first glance
Lendl gets on the back foot to this back of a length delivery
Lendl looking for the slog-sweep as Ashwin pitches this again on leg, but turns away from Lendl, who doesn't get bat on it. Wide is called as it went down the leg side
Lendl tries to work this away, but does not get a meaningful connection
fuller length ball on and around off and shaping in as this one hits the pads. Good start from Shami
back of a length delivery wide of off stump as Lendl punches this through the covers for one
full and going away from the left-hander as Darren drives this straight to mid-off
full delivery right on middle and leg as Darren is able to keep it out
shortish length delivery which Darren cuts every so late through the third man region
full again from Shami as Lendl drives this straight back to Shami, who fields the ball successfully
length ball on middle and leg which Darren is able to keep out on the back foot
same line again as Darren defends this to the off side
back of a length this time as Darren gets back and pulls this fiercely between midwicket and square leg for four
full again as Darren times this sweetly to mid-off. Looking good now
again pulls out the sweep as this one drifts down the leg side. Called wide by the umpire
back of a length as Darren adjusts his feet to caress this off the back foot through the extra-cover region
full again and outside off as Lendl drives this down to long-off
good length ball outside off as Lendl advances down to loft this over cover, but instead gets an edge on it which races through the third man region for a boundary
full from Shami as Lendl tucks this away to mid-on, with the pair running fast enough to get the single, despite the incoming throw
full again and shaping away Darren holds firm to push this through the off side for one
full and just outside off as Lendl drives this straight towards mid-off
full length ball which is defended towards the off side
back of a length on and around off as Darren drives this towards the off side for a single and retain strike for the next over
pitching on leg and turning into Darren as this one hits the pad towards the off side
goes for the sweep on this full delivery from Ashwin
length ball which Darren defends, but gets an inside edge which carries to fine leg, so he is able to take a single
back of a length ball which Lendl pushes towards the leg side for one
Darren wanted to time this full delivery with a drive through cover, but instead hits it leg side
playing a dangerous game here as Darren hangs his bat to defend, but instead the ball turns sharply away, just missing the edge on its way into Dhoni's gloves
fuller length ball on and around off which is defended
full again as Lendl tries to work this away to the leg side
Lendl able to push this fuller length ball down to long-on
full and wide as Darren just bludgeons this through the line, but doesn't hit it cleanly enough to get to the boundary
Lendl able to glance this back of a length ball which turned into him behind square on the leg side
drifted on off and turning away as Darren looks for the late cut
full again as Lendl gets forward to defend
same result again as this time it is delivered just outside off
full once more as Lendl sees the pattern and clubs this over square leg with a slog-sweep for six
full once more as Lendl stretches forward to defend
again full as Lendl just pushes this down to long-off for one
full from outside and Darren evokes memories of Lara with a booming drive through the covers, hit so hard that no one in the field bothered to move an inch

full and on middle and leg as Raina hits the front pad of Lendl. Raina instantly goes up, and after some deliberation, the umpire raises his finger. Replays show, however, that this one was definitely going down the leg side. Unlucky for Lendl, but India would be mighty pleased to see the back of him
fired in on middle and off as Deonarine holds the fort down
once again Deonarine gets on the front foot to defend
lovely flight from Raina as Deonarine hits this straight back at him
once again Deonarine tries to break the shackles, but Raina does well to field the ball off his return
and once more as Deonarine succeeds in hitting it straight back at Raina, as he finishes with a wicket-maiden
back of a length and turning away as Darren gets on the back foot to cut this behind delicately
flighted on off as Deonarine leans in for a drive, but can't find the gap
fuller length ball again as Deonarine plays this back to the bowler
back of a length and turning away as Deonarine plays with an angled bat, lucky he didn't get an edge there
slightly quicker as Deonarine gets forward in defence
too full from Ashwin as Deonarine is able to turn this away down to long-on for to finally get off the mark
Deonarine drives this towards the covers
goes for the sweep on this full ball as Raina jumps up for a shout
back of a length which Darren gets back to and try to push through the off side
this time is able to get it away with a punch off the back foot
flighted on off as Deonarine drives this towards the off side
slightly fuller on a middle stump channel as Darren cuts this away off the back foot through the off side
flighted on middle and leg as Darren defends off the front foot
loopy delivery on leg which Darren just sticks his bat out too
what a jaffa from Ashwin! gets this one to turn and bounce sharply away from Darren as he looks to defend off the back foot
this time Darren plays a little more positively with a push off the back foot to the off side
flighted on middle and leg which Deonarine clips through the long-on region
Darren able to punch this off the back foot for a single, and keep the strike
tad short and on off, Bravo stays back and punches it to sweeper cover
fuller length ball which straightens upon pitching as this one keeps low to beat the sweep shot from Deonarine and clatter into the off stump to have him dismissed for just 4
back of a length and turning in as Dwayne punches this back at Raina
beautiful flight on this full length ball just outside off which is defended on the front foot
full again as Dwayne is able to steer this down to the leg side for one
back of a length and turing away as Darren tries to squirt this away through the off side
fulelr length ball on off and turning in, defended off the back foot
once again defended to the off side
full once more as Dwayne chips this over the mid-off region for a single
drags this one wide outside off as Darren is unable to get this away to the boundary
slightly fuller outside off as Darren flashes at this hard through the off side
fired in on leg as Dwayne looks to clip this off his pads to the leg side
quicker one on leg which hits Darren's pads as the Indians let out an appeal
once again on middle and leg as the ball is defended to the off side
quicker one on middle as Darren is able to drive this for a single and get to his 13th ODI fifty. Splendid knock under pressure with wickets tumbling all around him. Kind of reminiscent to Lara no?
back of a length as Dwayne is able to advance down the track and clip this through midwicket
fuller length ball outside off which is driven towards the off side
back of a length outside off which is cut away by Dwayne. Fielder is able to pull it back in time before it hit the extra-cover rope
nudged away towards midwicket as he tosses it up on leg stump
tossed up on off stump as he comes forward and defends
nicely flighted outside off again as Bravo opens the face of the bat and calls for the single. But Jadeja swoops in from point and fires the thrown in at Dhoni's boots. The batsman is just in
drags it short, but with Rohit bowling it much slower than the other spinners, the batsman's timing is off as he cuts it away through cover
shortish again and this one has enough room for Lil B to go back and cut away to deep point
tossed up on off stump as he comes forward and keeps it out to end the over
over-ambitious appeal from Jadeja as he spears it on the pads. Pitched outside leg stump too as the batsman goes for the sweep and fails to connect
plays with half a bat as he steers the full length ball on off stump to the right of point
gets nicely forward and nudges the ball towards the midwicket region for an easy single
gets up to his full height to punch the length ball down the ground to mid-off
that was in the slot and Bravo swings with the turn to punish the ball well over the midwicket boundary. Full and on the pads and the batsman was going at it with complete conviction
pushed through quicker and he is up to it, staying back to push it down the pitch
pushed through on off stump as he goes back, waits for the ball to turn and keeps it out
this was fuller on middle and he goes forward to defend
length ball on middle and leg as he goes back to work it off his hips to fine leg

lots of air to that one and Bravo was looking to slam that one over the leg side, but the dip on it makes the ball sneak under his bat swing and hit his front leg. Appeal for leg before, but that was outside leg stump
whacked! That time he had room to free his arms and he hoists the length ball from outside off stump over cow corner.
quicker ball angled across the right-hander as he stays back and blocks
starts off with an off cutter, 127 kph, length ball steered across the left-hander who dabs it away to point

picked away off his pads and big Bravo has timed that well enough to take it to the fine leg boundary. Poor bowling from Shami and he pays for it as his length ball is exploited with fine leg inside the circle
does better this time as he keeps the ball on the stumps forcing the batsman to get behind it and block
stayed low and that one dipped in as well, but Bravo has clipped the length ball away to deep midwicket quite smartly

133 kph shooter and it shot through to rattle off stump. Lil B cannot believe he has been done in like that. Walks back with a 'Why me?' expression on his face as Shami keeps this ball on a length and it misbehaves quite badly, sneaking along at shin high to beat his defences
fullish ball, angled into the batsman who works it away to midwicket off his back foot

strides out of the comfort of his crease and is rewarded for his bravery. Reaches the pitch of the ball and drills the ball straight down the ground. He was looking to loft it, but had almost yorked himself and as the ball scurries away all along the ground
tossed up on off stump as he comes forward and defends

rush of blood from this West Indies captain as well! Horrible shot as he races down the pitch with the intention of murdering the ball, but Jadeja turns it right across him and Dhoni does the rest, demolishing all three stumps
flighted ball on off stump as he comes forward and drives through the covers
gets forward and uses soft hands to guide the ball between cover and point and he sneaks another single
more turn on offer even if Jadeja doesn't flight it too much as Holder's searching forward defensive was in vain
length ball, seaming into him as he clips it away to midwicket and Sammy holds his hand up to signal that he doesn't want a run
137 kph, Sammy showing incredible restraint here as he gets forward and defends quite well. It was a fullish ball just outside off
slower ball at 124 kph, as Sammy has to adjust his shot. he was on the front foot too soon, but he waits for the ball to arrive and blocks again
plays and misses and this one takes off from back of a length. Sammy was prodding on the front foot to defend, but with the extra bounce he tries to sway out of the way awkwardly
drilled down the ground to long-on as Shami goes fuller. The batsman was firmly in his crease and presented a straight bat
well bowled. Only one run off the over in the batting powerplay to boot as he keeps it full and straight to the tail-ender who keeps it out
flattish ball just outside off stump allowing the batsman to let it go
this one rises from a length, even with Jadeja pushing it through at 93 kph. He was looking to defend that ball but the ball rears up and turns big to beat the outside edge
tossed up on leg stump as he gets forward and works it away towards midwicket
tosses it up again as Holder comes forward and defends well
pushed through and angled on leg stump as he stays back and pushes it towards midwicket
gets right to the pitch of that one and keeps bat and pad together to block down the pitch
keeps low again as Dhoni plops his pads together to stop the ball. The batsman was looking to flay that through the covers, but with the ball scooting thorugh he had no chance
this one arrives at a proper bounce as Holder goes forward and drives on the up to mid-off
full length ball on middle and off as he gets back behind it and blocks
slower ball, and that beats short fine leg despite a fine diving effort to his right. The batsman had tickled the back of a length ball just fine enough to pick up a timely boundary
back of a length again but this was on off stump as he works it away toward midwicket
full length ball drifting on the pads again as Holder shuffles across and clips it away square on the leg side
arm ball from Jadeja finds the batsman on his front foot, albeit reluctantly. A thick outside edge takes the ball to second slip
tossed up on middle and leg as he makes some room and drives rather handsomely to deep extra
flighted on leg stump as Sammy gets forward to defend
holds it back and the batsman was expecting it as he moves back to work it off his hips into the leg side
on a length on off stump as Holder comes forward to block
pushed through and goes on with the arm again. Holder did well to get bat to that, especially considering the ball kept a little low and his height
stays rooted to the crease as he offers a horizontal bat to meet the line of the length ball angled into the stumps
slower ball but the batsman is aware as he lets it come to him and drives wide of mid-off

what a shot! Took a couple of steps down the ground and slammed the length ball over the off side infield. Excellent timing from the big West Indian as that ball skims away one bounce into the boundary
on a length, but this time he was on middle forcing the batsman to block off the back foot
another slower ball, 114 kph this time but the batsman gets firmly forward to meet it with a straight bat
back of a length as he looks to test the middle of the wicket, but Holder reaches his full height and punches it to cover rather effortlessly

his patience runs out. The spinners were too tempting for him as he lofts the full length ball speared into his pads. It has height, but lacks in distance as long-on steadies himself under it and takes a safe catch. Sammy hangs his head while Jadeja clasps his palms together in thanks
pushes it through as his action goes immensely round-arm. the batsman, stuck in the crease, manages to push it toward mid-on and sneak a single
pushed through on off stump as he comes forward and blocks
ample turn on offer as Narine stays back to the length delivery pitching well outside off and impacting the bat on middle
prefers to stay back as Jadeja bowls this one a little fuller. Narine defends well
this time he is drawn forward again as he opens the face to work the full length ball towards cover
tossed up on off stump and is tamely defended back ot the bowler
more room on offer as he strides forward and drives through the covers
flighted on off stump and is prodded back to the bowler

oh, what a gift. He was playing against the line of the ball, even if it was outside leg stump, and gets a leading edge. The ball lobbed in the air and Ashwin had all the time in the world to get underneath that. On a pitch that is turning and bouncing inappropriately, you have to play with the spin and with a straight bat
gets forward with his bat and pad together to defend the flighted ball on off stump
darts this down the leg side, hoping to turn it across the left-hander, but there isn't enough on offer as Rampaul defends
flighted on off stump as he comes forward and defends
gets forward to the dart on off stump and blocks
flat, good length ball on middle as the batsman goes back to push down the ground
well played, waits for the turn and lets the length ball on off stump run along the face of his bat to point
uses a little more flight against Rampaul who prods tentatively forward to block
and this time his uncertainty gets the better of him as the ball runs along with the arm and beats his defense
full length ball on and around off stump as he works it away to point off the front foot
133 kph, full and angled at off stump as Holder strides forward and drives the ball into the covers
forces Holder back in his crease as the short of a length ball is pushed to long-on for a single
hint of movement away as he bowls full on middle, but not too much to trouble the batsman in spite of him not being inclined to move forward or back. The straight bat however is his saving grace
fullish ball on leg stump as Rampaul stays back in his crease and keeps it out
slower ball gone wrong. That off cutter was bowled well down the leg side, too far for the batsman to reach
follows it up with a short ball which Rampaul ducks under. Nicely directed but didn't look like there was too much pace on it

drills it straight to mid-off and sets off for a suicidal single, but Raina cannot hit the stumps. Full length ball on off stump could have caused a lot of trouble there, even with Rampaul pulling out the full stretch
this one comes into the left-hander, who strode forward and blocks
leaps up from a length to take the shoulder of the bat as he prods it into the off side
goes for the sweep with the ball outside off, but that beats him completely
length ball outside off and he gets back behind it and defends

and that is all she wrote as Rampaul goes for the bit hit and is caught in the deep on the leg side. He dragged the tossed up ball from well outside off stump, which cut his timing down to considerable extents. Shikhar Dhawan made excellent ground from long-on as he ran to his left and held on to a good catch

inn2.comm: short delivery outside off but stays quite low as Rohit adjusts his defence well. Was looking to play high off the back foot, but got the bat down
Rampaul strays his lines to send this one down the leg side for the first wide of the innings
too full on the pads as Rohit clips this gently behind square for the first run for India
back of a length and shaping away as Dhawan dabs this down to third man for a single
back of a length on middle and leg which Rohit tucks away towards mid-on
slightly fuller outside off as Rohit punches this towards point
similar length as before as Rohit opens the face to steer this behind square on the off side for a single

back of a length and Holder starts off with a jaffa off a ball as he gets this to come in from outside off, with Rohit looking to defend, and the ball goes off Johnson Charles' glove and behind to third man. Everyone in the slip cordon looks bemused. What a start from Holder! Definitely squared up Rohit there
slightly fuller on the same line as this one comes back in and hits him on the right elbow onto the body
normalcy has returned after Rohit dabs this length ball outside off down to third man for a single
back of a length and shaping away as Dhawan defends this towards the off side
back of a length and going well wide as this one lands quite wide, with the keeper having to make a dive. Not claled wide
slightly fuller and Dhawan makes him pay as it is in the slot and all Dhawan needs to do is lean into a drive through extra-cover for a four
too full again from Rampaul as Rohit has all day to glance this off his pads
good length ball just outside off as Rohit looks for a drive, with the ball beating the edge on its way to Charles
139 kph, back of a length on middle and leg which Rohit defends off the back foot
138 kph, squares him up with a short of a length ball on off which is played towards point/backward point
back of a length and rising on off as Rohit is able to steer this behind point for one
back of a length outside off which Dhawan plays towards the off side
length ball outside off which is again dabbed down to third man for one

back of a length and shaping away as Dhawan finds no room to edge this away, as the ball catches the outside edge on the way to the keeper. The West Indian fielders roar in ecstasy as India are one down quite early in the piece
defends his first ball with a beautiful back foot defence
back of a length and coming in as Kohli just times this effortlessly on the up through the covers, all the way to the extra-cover boundary. What a way to get off the mark from the India No. 3!
back of a length and coming in as Kohli is resolute in defence
and now he bowls it on the leg side with Kohli clipping this through square leg for a couple

back of a length and once again Rohit is squared up as the ball catches the edge to fly through the third man region for a boundary. Really unlucky for the West Indies as they have bowled quite well in these early exchanges
length ball on off as Rohit brings out his front foot defence
back of a length on middle and leg which is turned to the leg side
back of a length on off as Rohit defends towards the covers

back of a length and rising quite appreciably as Rohit has a go at it, in his own inimitable way, and Rampaul is adamant as the ball goes through to the keeper that there was an edge. No reaction from Charles though
back of a length outside off as Rohit defends this on the top of his toes
shortish length drifting towards the leg side as Kohli clips this through midwicket
slightly fuller, and getting some bounce, as Kohli gets on the back foot to defend
length ball outside off which Kohli defends towards the off side
back of a length and shaping into Kohli as he just glances this behind square on the leg side for a beautifully timed boundary
back of a length and staying quite low this time as Kohli is surprised by the lack of bounce with this one hitting between his pads and stomach
not good enough as this one is splayed down the leg side, with the umpire signalling for a wide
length ball outside off as Kohli pushes this towards mid-off, with the pair running quickly to complete a single
length ball again straying on the pads and Kohli is already in position to just flick this effortlessly through the gap at midwicket to find yet another boundary
back of a length this time outside off as Kohli dabs this down to third man for a single. Wanted two but lost his footing at the non-strikers
length ball and rising as Rohit opens the face to steer this down to third man to get off strike
back of a length on and around off as Kohli gets into position beautifully to defend off the back foot
length ball outside off which is left alone by Kohli
similar length again, but this one rears off the track as Charles completes a smart take
length ball outside off which is punched towards the off side by Rohit. Played that one with soft hands
Holder sends this one wide outside off as a wide is called by the umpire
back of a length outside off as Kohli turns this behind point, with point making a feeble dive to try and recover it
back of a length and slanting in as Rohit defends on the front foot
back of a length and spearing in on middle and leg as Rohit flicks this behind square on the leg side
once again slanting in as Kohli just glides this behind square leg for one. Too easy for India here
slightly fuller length on a better line as Kohli is solid in defence
length ball wide of off stump as Kohli waits on the back foot to punch this crisply through the covers for a boundary through the extra-cover region
width and bounce provided from Rampaul as Kohli reins in his instincts to allow this one through to the keeper
full and overpitched as Kohli leans into a drive through the point region. Would have liked to put that one away as it was asking for treatment
length ball slanting in on the pads as Rohit just clips this to the leg side
back of a length outside off as Kohli shows off his back foot defence to the Kochi crowd
length ball outside off as Kohli shoulders arms
starts off with a 123 kph loosener on and around off at a length which is defended without any issues
length ball outside off as Sharma looks to flash at it, with the ball carrying behind through third man. Batsmen are able to sneak a run
back of a length outside off as Kohli flashes at this through the point region to find the boundary. Lovely shot that from Kohli
length ball angling in with some movement as Kohli just defends this off the back foot. Better line from the West Indian
length ball just outside off as Kohli is happy to defend this one back to the bowler
back of a length and cutting in as Kohli sees out the over
begins with a lovely flighted delivery just outside off which is defended back to him
gets sharp turn from a back of a length outside off as Rohit has no clue about its eventual trajectory

length ball which invites the slog sweep as Rohit takes the bait and completes one that is so well timed. Holder, who was stationed at fine leg just for this, is unable to get in close enough to take the catch, and what is worse that he lets it through to the boundary after an initial fumble
flighted and on off, Sharma gets forward and blocks
this one is pitched too wide as Rohit is able to play this late behind square on the off side to get this almost to the boundary, with third man doing well to get there
Rohit plays this towards mid-on to finish off the over
back of a length outside off as Kohli just plays this down to long-on for a single
back of a length wide of off stump as Rohit has a flash, but doesn't get any connection on it
pitched up slightly fuller as Rohit opens the face, but finds backward point
back of a length outside off and Rohit times this beautifully through the gap between sweeper cover and third man to find the boundary. Just seemed to fly off the bat with the most minimal of effort
defended on the off side to a back of a length delivery
too full from Sammy and in the slot as Kohli just scythes this in the gap between point and cover to find the boundary once more. This went off like a flash to the rope
length ball and turning in as Kohli defends to the leg side

once again length and turning into the batsman, but does just enough to beat Kohli, the keeper, and whoever else all the way to the fine leg boundary. Extra runs are not going to help at all for the West Indies
Kohli able to get off strike as he cuts this away to the off side
length ball again and turning in as Rohit misses this one completely as it hits his leg pad

this one slightly full on the same line and Rohit decides to unfurl the big slog-sweep through midwicket, which travels far enough to go over the rope for six. Greeted by a huge roar from the Kochi contingent
Rohit finagles this behind to backward point to get off strike
length and turning in as Kohli just works this down to long-on
starts round the wicket with a length ball as Kohli opens his stance to turn this away to the leg side for one
back of a length and worked away by Rohit towards midwicket
Kohli gets on the back foot to clip this gently to the leg side
fires in a quicker one which ends up being defended back to the bowler
once again a quicker one as Rohit steers this down to long-off
Kohli tries to work this away on the leg side, but ends up hitting it back to the bowler
back of a length and with some bounce as this turns in rapidly into Rohit's pads
length ball and Rohit is unable to work this off his pads
length again from Narine as Rohit works with this spin to guide this one off his pads to the leg side
Kohli able to dab this fuller delivery down to long-on
Rohit advances down just a bit to guide this to long-on for a single
Kohli looks to get forward before rocking back to try and work this to the leg side
too full from Deonarine as Rohit just drives this through the off side for a majestic cover drive
this time Deonarine shortens the length, and Rohit answers with a deft cut off the back foot through point to make it consecutive boundaries
and brings up his fifty with an easy dab down to long-on. He has hit 141, 209, 177 and 111*, now this. What a month he is having!
Kohli just eases this down to long-off to get Rohit back on strike
length ball which is turned away by Rohit to the leg side for a single and to retain the strike
stays back to this full, flatter ball on middle and pushes it to mid-on
shortish and keeping a little low as well, but Rohit who had made room cuts the ball to cover
big offspinner from Narine, but it doesn't trouble Rohit as he stride forward and blocks
too much turn as Rohit's dab behind square on the leg side is beaten
pushed through on off stump and he elicits considerable turn as well as Rohit stays back and dabs it to third man
gets back to drill the  good length ball turning into him to long-on
length ball on off stump is punched down the ground for a single
pitches it full, but offers room to the batsman who eases forward and drills the drive to cover, who does well to keep it to none
length ball just outside off as he blocks it away safely
swatted down the ground as it is pitched short and keeps low on middle
waits for this one to reach him and uses the room to cut to point
slower ball just outside off stump as he drives back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump as he goes back, stands to his full height and blocks easily
sees this flighted outside off and Kohli strides forward to defend
this was pushed through and Kohli was waiting on the back foot and slaps it to long-on

cut against the turn, but he has struck it perfectly. Stays leg side of the length ball which turns sharply and exploits the gap between point and cover and Rohit's trademark timing takes the ball all the way
tossed up from Narine, but Rohit was waiting for that as he goes down to play a lap sweep and gets it fine enough to collect a couple
maintains his flight but this time Rohit is happy with a simple dab into the leg side
leg cutter to start the over as Rohit leans into an elegant cover drive. There is a man in the deep though

uses whatever pace Simmons has and lets the ball run along the face of his bat all the way to the third man boundary. The fielder was inside the circle and Rohit hit the ball after it passed him to get it fine on him
length ball just outside off as Rohit pushes towards cover
angles the length ball into the batsman who stays on the back foot and punches the ball down the ground
and it's Rohit's turn. Punches it to long-on after camping on his back foot to meet the length ball on middle
channels a line outside off, but Kohli is untroubled again as he stays on his back foot and cuts to point
traps the ball between his gloves and the knee-roll of the pad as he goes forward to block a big turning offspinner
gets forward and blocks another flighted traditional off spinner
nudged down the ground to get off strike as Narine invests in another offie
how has that reached the boundary?! Kohli had just tucked another off spinner coming off a good length away dead square and it just scuttled off to the boundary.
that one stayed low, and Kohli was on the back foot too. Lucky to survive as it takes the bottom of the bat and sneaks off toward fine leg
huge offspinner and the turn was so extravagant that it beats the flick shot down the leg side byt a mile
stays back again, and cuts the ball off the stumps. he wasn't looking to slam the ball, which is why it finds the cover fielder
just a hint of room offered and that is enough for Rohit to go right back in his crease and cut to cover point
driven solidly off the front foot as Simmons keeps it full and just outside off. Elegant from Kohli
full toss, reckon thats the slower ball gone wrong, as Rohit pushes the ball down the ground for a single
picked away off his hips as Simmons strays on the pads. Midwicket saves him the blushes
this time he was full and invites the batsman forward, who finds midwicket
flays that through cover. Far too much room from Simmons on that full, loopy ball but the man in the deep keeps it to one
127 kph, loose, length ball on the batsman's hip as Kohli tucks it away to midwicket.
back of a length just outside off as Kohli reads the line and lets the ball run off a defensive prod played with soft hands
the maker's name was perfectly visible there as he meets the near-half-volley on off stump with a controlled drive to long-on
he looks so good through the covers. Full length ball, with just enough for Kohli to come forward and stroke it through to the man in the deep
was looking to wind up but the length ball gets just the smallest bit of inward movement to make him check his shot into a defensive push back to the bowler
this time the back of a length ball is dabbed towards the point region and the batsman run through for a single
fifty for Kohli as he whips the full length ball on his pads to deep midwicket. That shot epitomises his innings - effortless
sprays it so far down the leg side that the keeper has to dive full length to make sure it didn't go off for byes
lovely shot. It was a full ball outside off and Rohit strides into an elegant off drive, but with mid-off in the circle it ends up a dot ball
nudged away to deep square leg as Bravo strays on the pads with a fuller length ball again
he has to bowl that one again too. Got his radar completely off in this over, does Bravo, as he bowls this one far too wide outside leg
clipped smartly off his pads as Bravo persists with attacking the batsmen on leg stump
better. Length ball on middle stump which Rohit negotiates with a straight bat to long-on
finishes well as he holds his line on middle stump and Kohli plays the ball to midwicket, somehow with a straight bat
steers the back of a length ball outside off stump to the man waiting at deep third man
138 kph, short again but Kohli, as Rohit before him, negotiates it quite easily. Gets to his full height and defends back to the bowler
didn't look quite so pretty on that one as he benefits from an inside edge. It was a fullish ball which drew Kohli to a drive on the up. It was quite close to leg stump as it ran down to fine leg
dug into the middle of the wicket, but Kohli swivels on his back foot to thump the ball through midwicket
slower ball dupes Rohit. Lovely off cutter from the bowler and Rohit who was looking to pull out a late cut, misses completely

short ball works, how many time have we seen that? Rohit took it on but his mistake was not keeping the ball down as deep midwicket steadies himself to pick up a simple catch. Effort ball from Rampaul got it as high as Rohit's chest forcing him to lose control of the shot
yorker on leg stump, but he did not have the field for that. Fine leg was up and all Kohli had to do was work the ball fine of the man. Clever batting

this time he plays it square of the man at  short fine as Bravo continues with an inexplicably-leg-stump line. Sunil Narine adds insult to injury as he just escorts the ball to the boundary. Kohli on the charge here
and he literally charges now, but seeing this was was the off cutter, adjusts and blocks down the wicket
length ball on middle which allows Kohli to go back in his crease and thump the ball to long-on
predictably its a short ball, but Bravo's pace is easy enough for Yuvi to handle as he gets in line and defends
he's tempted. Yuvi would have thought that fullish ball well outside off was an easy way to get off the mark, but he has no balance on the front foot and his shovel-drive does not connect
starts off with an off cutter, which Kohli is happy to nudge to point with an open face off the back foot
was looking to get on top of the bounce, but Rampaul's back of a length ball outside off is just a little too big for Kohli to time it properly as cover moves to his left to grab that
slower ball, which is on a length again as Kohli directs a defensive shot to point with soft hands
do not bowl short to me, says Kohli as he shuffles across and whacks the ball behind square and it sails away. He was onto that in a the proverbial flash
back of a length again, but this time outside off as he dabs it behind point for a single
full length ball on off stump forces Yuvraj to play, which he does, defending on the front foot
strays on the pads again and Kohli easily picks that away straight of midwicket to pick up a couple
shortish on the body, but not too threatening as Kohli works it away to midwicket.
he was onto that too quickly and Kohli knows it as he flashes a wry smile. He had sent a similar ball over the fine leg boundary, but this one brushes his glove and dribbles away beside his legs
fullish ball on middle as Kohli pushes it to long-on
digs it in, but it just does not rise up as Yuvraj stays back in his crease and half-whips-half-pulls the ball to the right of the man at deep fine leg, who pulls out the boot just in time
short ball, just outside off this time as Yuvraj dabs it towards point and picks up a single
this one goes the other way, but his direction is all wrong as Yuvraj tuckes the leg spinner very fine
big offie to correct himself as Yuvi strides forward and blocks
worked away off his pads as the length ball is negotiated with bat and pad close together

gets into an awkward position as this one comes into the left-hander as well. Yuvi was not expecting it to turn as much and his adjustment was a little late as he jams the ball between his bat and pad
off spinner to rattle the batsman, but since he was on the back foot, he reads it from the pitch and slaps it through the covers
another shortish ball to end the over as Kohli's cut finds point
fullish length angling into the off stump as he stays in his crease to block
room on offer and he was looking to exploit it, but reins himself in as he lets it go. But the keeper fumbles allowing the batsmen to sneak a single
back of a length on off stump as he goes confidently back to push it down to long-on
shortish again, and Yuvraj who was looking for it there blocks quite easily from the back foot
pushes his length forward and Yuvraj who was camping on his back foot doesn't look too confident with his defensive shot on off stump
back of a length angled into off stump and the defensive bat of Yuvraj keeps it out
doesn't matter if that turns to end up on leg stump having started from outside off as Kohli goes back and whips the ball to deep midwicket and has placed it well enough for a couple
turns far too much outside leg and the umpire calls Narine out on it
its the leggie this time and Kohli has misread it completely. He went for the pull and the ball ducked beneath his bat as the keeper fumbles as well
whipped away behind square on the leg side as the length ball becomes easy pickings
strays on the leg side of the left-hander this time who is happy to return the strike to Kohli by tucking the ball to deep fine leg
tossed up on off stump and he drives the ball to long-off to taking him to 4999 runs
fires it down the leg side and it was the leg spinner as well. Easy call for the umpire
and he bowls the offie as a double bluff, but Yuvi is not tempted as he lets it go
and he does it with a magnificent pull shot to take him to 5000 runs. He slams it well in front of square and that looked quite as imperious as the man he joins as the fastest to the mark

but he's gone now! Goes for one hit too many as he looks to loft the ball straight over the bowler's head, but mistimes it. Sunil Narine gets underneath the skier and holds on to a good catch to end Kohli's stay at the wicket. So he gets the record, but misses on his ton. But statistics aside, that was an immensely smooth innings
full and angled into his pads as Yuvraj shuffles across and works the ball wide of mid-on
back of a length on off stump as Raina gets back and defends with a straight bat
just short of a good length as Raina waiting for chin music is stuck on the back foot. The ball raps him on the pads as he looked to adjust and guide the ball to third man, but it was too high
sees it flighted on off stump and Yuvraj hits it with the turn to long-off to pick up a single
off spinner to kick things off as Raina moves back and across and nudges it towards midwicket
goes back to negotiate a fullish length ball, and this one which was pushed through nearly broke through his defences. But he keeps it out

oh, it was on the cards and Narine picks up his man. Poor shot selection from the batsman as he raced down the pitch to buck the pressure off his shoulders. Narine had slipped in the off spinner that time and the ball turns to take the outside edge and carries safely to the hands of point
pushed through at 92 kph as Dhoni reads the off spinner and flicks it to the left of leg slip and fine enough to trickle to the fine leg boundarly
stays back to nudge the length ball turning into him just in front of square to end the over
back of a length just outside off stump as he stays back and defends

and looks like he's had enough of this short-pitched attack that just isn't rising high enough to trouble him. Stays solidly balanced in his crease as he pulls this straight to the man at deep midwicket

oh, is he out?! Umpire Kulkarni is going to have a chat with Rod Tucker and it is going to be sent upstairs. Delicious away swinger from Holder which Dhoni prods at, considering it was full length. There was a thick edge, but it looks like it has bounced in front of the keeper. The umpires had asked WI if they wanted to withdraw the appeal, but it seems they weren't entirely sure so they wanted confirmation themselves

walks at the bowler and employs an purely agricultural slog, but Ravi Rampaul has just gifted the Indian captain with another boundary. He was just ambling around from his pace at deep fine leg and was looking to stop the ball with his boot, but it trickles through
length ball on off stump and he thumps it straight down the ground for a one-bounce four. MSD's power on prime display there
length ball on middle and off as Dhoni covers the line and blocks towards mid-off
ample turn into the batsman there and Yuvi has not picked that up at all. He was looking to cut but the ball was the one cutting him in half and lodging in his pad
this time he darts the ball right across the left-hander as he strides forward to block and misses it
play and miss again as he tosses it up on off stump and turns it away sharply
held this one back just a touch, but there are enough revs on the ball to defeat Yuvi's tentative poke
inside edge saves him as this time he brings the ball into the batsman.
turns it wildly away from the bat as Yuvi goes forward searching for the ball and misses again.
full and on the pads as Dhoni just clips this to square leg for one

length ball outside off and Yuvraj has a flash, in hopes of finding the gap on the off side, but instead gets a thick outside edge which travels behind to the keeper. Charles dives valiantly to the right, but ends up spilling the catch, with the ball travelling behind to the third man boundary for four. And with that, the match is over.
